title: RISC-V Efficient Core
description: High-Performance Edge Computing Architecture designed for AI inference.
details:
### Overview
This project involves the design and implementation of a 5-stage pipelined RISC-V processor core. The goal was to optimize for performance-per-watt in edge AI scenarios.

### Tech Stack
- **Verilog/SystemVerilog**
- **C++**
- **FPGA (Xilinx)**
- **Chisel**

### Technical Details
- **ISA Support**: RV64IMAC (Integer, Multiply, Atomic, Compressed).
- **Pipeline**: 5-Stage (Fetch, Decode, Execute, Memory, Writeback) with forwarding unit.
- **Branch Prediction**: Dynamic 2-bit saturating counter + BTB.
- **Memory System**: Direct-mapped I-Cache and 2-way set-associative D-Cache.

### Outcome
Successfully synthesized on Xilinx Artix-7 FPGA running at 100MHz. Capable of booting custom RTOS and running quantized neural network inference.

title: Market Alpha AI
description: Quantitative Analysis & Sentiment Engine for high-frequency trading markets.
details:
### Overview
Market Alpha AI is a proprietary research tool designed to identify arbitrage opportunities in high-frequency trading markets. By combining technical indicators with sentiment analysis from news sources and social media, the system provides a holistic view of market health.

### Tech Stack
- **Python**
- **PyTorch**
- **FastAPI**
- **React**
- **PostgreSQL**

### Key Features
- **Real-time Anomaly Detection**: Identifies price deviations >3σ using LSTM networks.
- **Sentiment Polarity Scoring**: NLP pipeline processing 50k+ news items daily.
- **Backtesting Engine**: Simulate strategies against 10 years of historical tick data.

### Architecture Highlight
The core engine uses a distributed microservices architecture. The specialized **Inference Service** is optimized for low-latency (<5ms) predictions, crucial for HFT environments.
